title: Devil’s Music - Novel Updates
tags: Bands   Charming Protagonist   Child Abuse   Complex Family Relationships   Demons   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Music   Siblings   Singers   Time Skip
author: 경우
description:
[Can the devil’s music bring happiness to the world?]
From Jimmy Hendrix to Rachmaninoff, all the historical musicians who he meets in his dreams.

The devil that presents itself as a little boy in love with singing.

The devil’s blessing, given to such a tiny child.

In the blessings of many devils,

The boy’s song for the world begins.>
